website_summaries.verdict: Raw and Roots' powder is 100% natural without added ingredients.
pros: Several users report lessened arthritic pain after using the golden milk powder
The powder blends well and has a nice, subtle hint of vanilla
Goes quite well with almond milk
cons: A few buyers report stomach upset after drinking product

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I have severe sinus issues and accidentally found out that Turmeric helped them. I decided to try out Raw & Root because they did not add sweetener to it and I liked the additional herbs added in. This product is fantastic!! I haven't had to take any sinus medication in over three weeks. I add a scoop to unsweetened almond milk and add a little honey also. I look forward to my morning cup every day. I am usually suffering with severe headaches every day and now I know what it's like to not have even a twinge of pain!
customer_reviews.author: ChiGal9

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I admit that I did not like the powder. The coconut powder, in my opinion, makes it sort of greasy tasting. Also, I did not enjoy the mix of herbs. I tried to use it as a latte and it just wasn't to my liking. However, that being said, the company was very gracious when I told them I didn't like it. They gave me a full refund and were quite understanding about my not liking their product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Eve

customer_reviews.title: Heat the milk and blend well!
customer_reviews.text: The Raw and Root Tur Latte mix is as described. Definitely heat the milk and stir or blend well. I like taking it before bedtime, I think it helps me sleep. It has a very peppery flavor and you can definitely taste the fennel and ginger. I wish the the fennel taste was a little less pronounced but hopefully the health benefits from the latte are worth getting past the fennel.
customer_reviews.author: southernreader15

customer_reviews.title: Check the measurements!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually pretty good and convenient. I wish I had read more reviews, and I hope someone reads this. There is only one issue, and I hope the maker can fix it. The measurement. It says to use one tsp (one scoop). The scoop is not equivalent to one teaspoon. The scoop is marked 11cc, one teaspoon is 5cc. So people are putting in more than twice what they should which is probably why they think it tastes bad or upsetting their stomach. Get a properly measured teaspoon and it tastes wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda W

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, it reminds me a little of Chai Tea......I blend it with silk soy milk, the regular one, in the evening and add a sprinkle of cinnamon to it and delish. In this cold weather we're having it warms me up and I feel I sleep better and my knees and fingers with arthritis aren't as stiff. Will continue to drink this regularly. Also bought a milk frother to use with it, perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: sallyn

customer_reviews.title: An easy and delicious way to get the benefits of turmeric
customer_reviews.text: My family has been touting the many benefits of turmeric (especially it's anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties) over the years, but I just never enjoyed it until now. I prepared it with milk and agave in a blender (sadly, we were out of honey), and I have to say it tasted fantastic! I was so impressed I added a scoop to my morning protein shake and it was also delicious (Optimum vanilla protein powder, banana, various seeds, and skim milk). I'm looking forward to trying it with coffee next, as well as the suggested heated latte recipe. And a nice little surprise - it comes with a scoop in the jar.
customer_reviews.author: Ultravelocity

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what I was expecting....
customer_reviews.text: I saw great reviews and I really wanted to love this! I was super excited when I received the item. I made it on the same night hoping it would help me sleep better. The taste was nothing like what I expected. I didn't even help me sleep better, either. That was the first time and last time I tried this tea and I think that says a lot about how I feel about this tea.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Check the ingredients and make sure you ask I do about them with your doctor
customer_reviews.text: I started vomiting profusely 10 minutes after drinking this? I’m not sure what the heck happened? Maybe an allergic reaction? I’m still sick today just quizzy and miserable I’m hoping it will pass quickly
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Redd

customer_reviews.title: Taste great will come back and update later.
customer_reviews.text: Made my first 8oz cup of cold latte with plant based almond milk. I did not add anything to it. The taste is not bad at all. There is ashwagandha which Im excited for that because I ordered the pills and now no longer need them. Hoping the latte does the same thing per everyones review of the ashwagandha capsules. I saw that others had a different scope so hoping this smaller scoop is the correct measurement. Im assuming maybe others got sick because the scoop sizing was to much.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: A new favorite
customer_reviews.text: This turmeric tea blend is delicious. I prefer it over Gaia brand because it doesn't have added sugar, ms it has all the spices I like to add in good proportions. I only add stevia to sweeten and a fat like ghee or coconut oil for the true Ayurvedic balance.
customer_reviews.author: Nitsa

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I needed a turmeric tea/latte mix that met the following criteria: -No added sugar (even "healthy" sugar) -No sweetener -Contains Ashwagandha -No probiotics (because I'll be adding it to hot water) -Preferably contain ginger and/or black pepper -Organic is always a plus The taste is fine and pleasant. Just the right amount of vanilla. Decent with hot water and a splash of milk, heavy cream, or non-dairy "mylk." Let's face it--I'm consuming turmeric for the benefits, not the flavor. Critiques: -KSM 66 Ashwagandha would be nice -I understand that fermented turmeric is a better product, but it might taste completely different. Something to consider. I will tell other people. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable improvement in joint pain and energy level
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this product for a week but I did notice an increase in energy and decrease in joint pain. First couple of days both my husband and I drank it in the evening and had difficult time sleeping so we switched it to mornings. For us a mix it with boiling water and then had 1/4 teaspoon of local honey and a splash of coconut/almond milk and it blends fine. In the past I have combined many of the same ingredients used in this powder and made a golden paste but with our busy lifestyle we weren't being consistent so this blend is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Orange is the new Black when it comes to tea and lattes!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I went to a cafe recently and ordered a ginger turmeric latte and was hooked. My mission was to find a way to replicate it at home so I could indulge anytime I was craving. The key was that it had to be healthy and sugar free first and foremost. Low and behold I came across this amazing product that was everything I was searching for and the value and cost was 100% worth it. A little goes a long way and it’s so easy to use with just some hot almond milk and a handheld frothing device.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Jones

customer_reviews.title: The taste is awful
customer_reviews.text: This tastes awful in coffee. I have several different turmeric powders I use in my coffee every morning. I decided to try this one and it's awful tasting, the worst I've ever had. It has a very strong black pepper taste to it. Maybe it would taste better in something else besides coffee.
customer_reviews.author: nikole lee wingate

customer_reviews.title: Soothing drink
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the taste of this drink, it’s soothing and spicy. I use unsweetened almond milk, and to sweeten it a bit, I add sugar free syrup from Choc Zero. I also whip it up using a stick frother. The only reason I gave it 4 stars, was because of the grittiness and the left over sediment at the bottom of my cup. I stir it throughout drinking it. I did contact the seller about this, and it is normal. If you buy this, please beware. It does stain.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: I have a very strong dislike for turmeric because of the pungent flavor. This is brilliantly flavored with cinnamon and powdered coconut milk. I heated up some cashew milk and blended it in. I was very happy to see that it blended in completely with minimal effort. I added a little stevia and it is pretty good. I'm giving this 5 stars because I know how good this is for me and the fact that it is quite palatable is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan Woman

customer_reviews.title: Ambivalent Turmeric Consumers Beware
customer_reviews.text: You need to REALLY like turmeric to enjoy this. I thought I did. I was wrong. Even after making it on the stove per the directions and sweetening it, it just didn’t taste great at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: Tur Latte
customer_reviews.text: I believe that it has all the great products in there that it list, yet I the flavor is dull compared to other Golden Milk products I have tried. I will continue to use it for the benefits, yet won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Oliphant

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I was surprised at how well this product worked even after the first try (creating "golden milk" by heating milk and stirring in this powder). Had chronic mild right hip/back pain and felt it improved considerably. My mother also has tried it and said her knee pain has diminished considerably and she loves the product as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Siva

customer_reviews.title: Good mixture of ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I use Tumeric for pain. I originally felt that it was kind of expensive but once I tried it I realized that it takes only a small amount so there are a lot of uses. My personal taste required adding a bit more cinnamon and some sweetner but overall I felt it was a good buy. I am not sure if it helped for pain or not because I take several things.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste with all important ingredients
customer_reviews.text: So , I use to make my own mixture using all these ingredients in this product and some more ( like saffron goes real good with all these ingredients & also good for your health ), but this not only tasted good but also has all important ingredients that I typically was using for my own recipe for an Ayurvedic Golden Milk formula. I got it at lightning deal , hoping can get this during sale / deal as otherwise I think its little expensive then making your own even though this its very convenient and handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently discovered Golden Latte at an independent coffee/tea shop. It was late and I didn't want a caffeinated drink so the the barista made me a Golden Milk. It was heavenly so I went in search of a mix for at home. I ordered two different brand mixes and bought the ingredients to make it from scratch. Hands down for simplicity and flavor TUR LATTE was the choice for me. I mix it with oat milk and honey and enjoy it after work to undo the stresses of the day. And if you want to dress up your morning coffee, a scoop of TUR LATTE will do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what people could complain about with this product. I blend it with my morning coffee, cream and a tsp of sugar , it's got a nice flavor and is easy to drink, dissolves well into hot coffee. I'm sure it would be good in a smoothie or with tea and cream. If you cant handle some flavor then just take capsules, but to me it's a mild spice.
customer_reviews.author: Jess K

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty healthy drink!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I like having something hot to sip on at night. Was drinking chicory but even that was causing heartburn.... This doesn't cause heartburn, it's great for arthritis, tastes wonderful. Yummy! I add a tiny bit of coconut oil just to get max benefits. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not My Cup of Latte
customer_reviews.text: The blend in my jar doesn't seem to fully dissolve when I add boiling hot water and stir for 20 seconds. I've tried other brands, and I don't have the same problem. Also, maybe it's just my sensitive palate, but I get a harsh aftertaste after drinking. Is it because the flavor profile emphasizes turmeric far more than ceylon or cinnamon? I'm not sure. Your experience may differ from mine. (September 2020)
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rafat

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great either.
customer_reviews.text: First I could not get this to really mix. If you don't drink it rather quickly the powder just settles to the bottom in a gritty sludge., even when whisked. The smell is wonderful with nice vanilla notes. Taste is OK, a peppery taste without the vanilla taste you would expect from the smell. I will eventually work through this jar but won't look forward to drinking it though. I will stick to chai or plain tea in the future.
customer_reviews.author: KTown

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but it is grainy to me and stays behind at the bottom of your cup. I love that it’s organic and it’s a great alternative but I would rather try another one instead to see if I like it more. I put this in my coffee or teas, and it smells great, but it doesn’t have much of a taste. I bought for pain in my fingers from typing, thought it might help but I only felt a slight improvement.
customer_reviews.author: CATGIRL!!

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was not what I expected and was a total waste of money. The taste was terrible and I just cannot drink this! TO TOP THIS OFF, IT IS NOT A RETURNABLE ITEM! If an item is not returnable, Amazon should note this in the product description!
customer_reviews.author: wbstrick

customer_reviews.title: Convenience and Quality Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery of product. I'm still trying to adjust amount that agrees with my stomach because I have problems with black pepper. It's supposed to help absorption of turmeric, but it's also an irritant to stomach linings for some people. I like the convenience of using this powder instead of making from scratch. I'll continue to experiment because I I love the quality of ingredients. I would purchase again !
customer_reviews.author: ALyx

customer_reviews.title: Did not agree with me.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to help with inflammation. Became sick to my stomach shortly after drinking half a cup. Tried it again a week later with the same result. I’m not sure why since I use turmeric in many of my recipes. Discarded the jar, Will not be re-ordering.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I don't really drink milk or milk subs so I just heated up water and added this. I think it's really delicious. I can't say I noticed any pain relief but I am not in daily pain, and I haven't been drinking it daily. From my light reading, I do think turmeric pretty well respected for combatting inflammation, and is activated by pepper, so the formula seems to be consistent with the information that is out there.
customer_reviews.author: bbmac

customer_reviews.title: Had trouble focusing and with speech! Gritty.
customer_reviews.text: Never finished using 2nd container. Worked for pain relief, tasted great in milk with honey. BUT after using two containers I found I was having trouble focusing and pronouncing words. These symptoms went away once I discontinued use! Also tended to get gritty as you got half way through the container. This is just my experience with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like how it tastes (but you might)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on a whim and for the apparent health benefits of Turmeric. I tried it with a latte as well as with regular coffee with and without cream and sugar. Personally I didn't like the taste of it, it wasn't offensive by any means but I felt it just made the coffee taste off. That's just my personal taste. I'm giving it 3 stars because it mixed well with my coffee and based on its reception it's a good product. I'm just not a fan of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try this, I’ve tried turmeric latte powders in the past that disappointed. This is delicious. I love that there is no sweetener so I can add my own. This has a slightly earthy, marshmallow, oatmeal taste. I’ve been having it before bed and look forward to it every night! I purchased 2 additional tubs and now have it on subscribe & save.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Hot Drink
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this product. I tried mixing it with cold almond milk but it didn't mix well. I mix it with hot water and then add the almond milk. I also add honey because the flavor by itself is not sweet.very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Bolger

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, great results! & great company!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this “latte” mix- it definitely is not as harsh as tumeric drinks I’ve tried in the past, and I can definitely tell a differently in digestion/ bloating with consistently adding this into my routine. I usually drink mixed with hot water in the evening, but I’m sure it would be even better mixed into warm nondairy milk (try oat or almond?). LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: This Works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she has been using it since then and says it helps with her pain and also helps her sleep. She loves it mixed with warm almond milk and drinks it twice a day in place of the coffee she used to drink.
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Palecek

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great but doesn't stay mixed at all
customer_reviews.text: This tastes really good and I like that it's organic. Unfortunately it's not ground finely enough to stay suspended in milk. Most of it ends up as grainy sludge at the bottom of the cup. It takes constant stirring to drink all the powder to get the anti-inflammatory benefits. This would be a great product if they could grind it finer.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously delicious 😋
customer_reviews.text: Just had this delivered today and I couldn’t wait to try first I want to say that there are many golden milk blends However this one caught my attention quick one because it’s very low in sugar and two it’s very low in carbs .... I wasn’t sure how it would taste but let me tell you it is so tasty I blended mine in the bullet to make it frothy sooo delicious I also use coconut milk so if you want more smooth probably just use regular milk but it has such great body and smoothness it is a little grainy at the bottom of cup but that’s just from all the spices no biggie 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Sgmez

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Sleep
customer_reviews.text: This Golden Milk is delicious. You need to warm it on the stove in the milk of your choice ( I used almond milk). I added two teaspoons of honey and stirred it until dissolved which only takes about 2 minutes. I had no issues with any sediment as some reviewers complained about. They may have added it to warm milk in a cup rather than warm it together in a small pot on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: I wish it tasted like tumeric
customer_reviews.text: It's very gritty and taste like grounded pepper. You can smell the coconut but cant taste it all. This simply taste like I'm pouring grounded pepper in my coffee. I was using Lairds vegan tumeric creamer, that really taste great. I thought I'd give another brand a try. Going back to lairds, I actually felt better after drinking lairds tumeric as compared to this.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Turd Latte
customer_reviews.text: Man this thing was crap. No matter what proper instructions you use, it taste like crap. Wanted to believe in the reviews it has for my son’s nighttime anxiety, but he had more anxiety dreading to drink this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve struggled with insomnia for decades. I’ve tried every kind of treatment, natural and pharmaceutical, and nothing helped. I heard about “moon milk “ for years but thought it was another old wives tale and that I would be wasting my money. I couldn’t have been more wrong. I wish I tried this item years ago. It does everything it promises to do. Try it NOW, don’t waste another night’s sleep like I did for years.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite health drink!
customer_reviews.text: I was debating whether or not I should take ibuprofen more often when I started using this product. My inflammation pain has went down significantly. I started working out too and was constantly sore. Started this and that stopped. I feel sooo much better. Just grateful I gave it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Melbelle F

customer_reviews.title: My favorite evening drink with my mom.
customer_reviews.text: My mom was struggling with a multitude of health problems cascading. We decided to give this a try and while I was making it for her, we started to drink it together every evening. Provides with good sleep and calming effects. I am reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Anyam

customer_reviews.title: Tastes actually good! All in one, so you don't have to add stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I try to add turmeric into my diet, but it's a pain to do it and to add other ingredients for golden milk. While I liked golden milk, it's not exactly my favorite. THIS is actually tasty. I added a bit of stevia, but I'm not sure I need to. Used my little stick mixer and heated it for five minutes. I'm sold - does it do what I hope turmeric is supposed to do? I don't know. But the good taste means I'll keep taking it - so there's a better chance for its benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: This Is A Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good turmeric golden milk. It is good with regular milk and alternate milk beverages. I have tried it with both as well as with and without honey. Just for the fun of it, I tried it with water as more of a tea and it was good despite having no sweetener. I plan to order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mick McLeno

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 scoop is the proper serving size.
customer_reviews.text: My entire family loves this product. Please see this in the reviews. A serving is 1/2 of a scoop. Many people who do not like the taste may be using an entire scoop. We measured and 1 tsp is 1/2 of a scoop.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: How it worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been making Golden milk from scratch for some time now and a friend suggested that I try this and see how it works! It has been one week and am not expecting miracles with this product, however the convenience of this product is definitely worth it! Hope to get the one that you have with honey added to the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping Better
customer_reviews.text: So far, my sleep is better as i was waking every 1 to 1 1/2 hrs and now I am sleeping 3 to 4 hrs straight. I do mix this with regular milk warmed and a little local honey or maple syrup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grainy and gritty-looks and tastes like dirt!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was poor, the plastic seal separated from the paper when I opened the jar and the product went flying all over the place. Once I finally made a cup of golden milk I spit my first sip out it tasted so bad. Then I tried another sip and it was chalky and grainy. I threw the whole cup away and there was so much grainy residue in the cup it looked like dirt. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Momof2boysSC

customer_reviews.title: Here is what you need to do to make it yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this product now that I know how to use it. A friend from India shared this hint with me. Take almond or coconut milk and mix it with the tur latte on a stove and boil it for 5 minutes. What a difference!!! Super yummy when I add half a teaspoon of erythritol. Yum, yum, yum. Absolutely helps with inflammation. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: AskSarah

customer_reviews.title: Not Gaia but still tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mix I've found that is not sweetened. My favorite golden milk latte mix is Gaia but it is sweetened so it's not complaint for Whole30 or Keto. This one is mild (some are too spicy) and easy to drink. I added a scoop of the powder to a teaspoon of vanilla ghee and then added macadamia milk. Yummy and is great before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Borderline ok
customer_reviews.text: The product was so-so. The turmeric taste is really diluted and when mixed with non-dairy beverage, then it was almost non-existent even if you increased how much powder is added. I have added other turmeric powders to a non-dairy drink and it was more flavorful. I will not re-purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: newbie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: Turmeric is the new Kale!!! I make my lattes with 1/2 coconut water and 1/2 nonfat milk...also, for variation it's fun to add Tea Masala peppery spices, as I like mine very peppery... A delicious afternoon pick me up....I swear my IBS is better, as well as my acne!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindy 74

customer_reviews.title: Heathfully delicious
customer_reviews.text: TUR LATTE is just what I was looking for. I use to make my own before bed drink, but finding this, I don't ever have to make it again. Just warm up my almond milk and add a scoop and hand whip it with a hand beater. It froths like a Latte and I add honey to sweeten and it is delicious. Taking this helps me to sleep better as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: It tastes alright but not the best golden milk I've had. Mostly disappointed in how poorly it mixes even using a milk frother. Pretty much just sinks to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Sara D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome I wish I had found it years ago, I sleep better wake up with less pain. It taste great I recommend buying a hand held frother to mix it with. I feel like I am doing something positive for my health. I will buy this for the rest of my life
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Thompson-Norman

customer_reviews.title: Helps me sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by a friend and I love it! I drink it at night before bed. Mix a dollop of honey to sweeten it up just enough to tame bitter taste. I have noticed when I don't drink it I wake up with my hands throbbing. I do not feel any discomfort when I use this nightly. I refuse to try any other brands because I KNOW this one works great!
customer_reviews.author: John Kob

customer_reviews.title: Fennel flavor overpowering
customer_reviews.text: Ok i tried this instead of my normal buy and i was disappointed because of the fennel taste, its way overpowering and i also did not feel any pain or inflammation relief. So if you love fennel taste this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making the ingredients all natural
customer_reviews.text: I give this product a 5 star because it taste good and it's all natural ingredients. I am allergic to corn and other golden milk brands have maltodextrin. This brand does not add corn additives. I sometimes mix it with my chai powder or with almond milk and coconut sugar. It's good both ways.
customer_reviews.author: TraderJoJos

customer_reviews.title: Make in a Contigo mug (like I do my matcha) and just shake the crap out of it
customer_reviews.text: Made it with water (heated in the Kuerig) and can’t wait to try with coconut milk. Added a bit of honey. Very interesting flavor combo, extremely healthy ingredients. Make in a Contigo mug (like I do my matcha) and just shake the crap out of it! Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dickman

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but delicious
customer_reviews.text: I have not had any experience of pain reflief with this latte mix. I bought it mainly because it would take too long to make the tea from scratch. I do like the flavor of the latte however, i think it is a bit pricey for the amount of product received. My husband and I drink it often. Delivery was on time and the packaging was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amby

customer_reviews.title: Loved the taste and highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product with almond milk and honey. Loved the taste and highly recommend it. I used one scoop of the powder as recommended in approx 8 oz of warm almond milk and added a tablespoon of organic honey as a sweetener. Next time i will try it as a smoothie with some fruit as well. Cant wait to try diff recipes . Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kunaljs1

customer_reviews.title: First time user.
customer_reviews.text: First time to use Golden Milk, so good! I like the benefits listed and really enjoy the taste, sweeten with Manuka honey. I drink it hot and look forward to it every morning. The Turmeric has been very beneficial with significantly reducing inflammation too. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Soothing Sleep Remedy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with Golden Milk. First, it tastes good. I add honey to it. The warmth is very soothing and lingers long after the drink is finished. Secondly, I slept like a baby. I had begun to have difficulty falling and staying asleep. Not anymore. It's too soon to tell about joint pain relief as I have only drank it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Products in times we need to give a kick to our immune system
customer_reviews.text: Love it, taste great with unsweetened almond mild and some cane sugar, with all the latest concerns about immune system this was a great buy, it does help me to sleep too, like some warm milk does, the ingredients make you relax for sure while they help your body!
customer_reviews.author: Sil

customer_reviews.title: Taste is pretty strong.
customer_reviews.text: Only taken twice. Having trouble getting past the taste. I think there has been a little help with my pain.
customer_reviews.author: patsy r. emery

customer_reviews.title: tastes yummy and does your body good
customer_reviews.text: it's a little small but you only need a little scoop of it a day ( it comes with the scoop ) so it's worth it! Joints, hair, skin soooooo much better. My whole family loves it so we will definitely be buying this on a continuous basis.
customer_reviews.author: Lu.

customer_reviews.title: Good if you can get passed the taste
customer_reviews.text: This is not very tasty at all. I tried it twice. Once when I first purchased and used in my coffee (very nasty); a second time in a smoothie and it didn't matter - it wasn't as good as the golden milk that I use from Sports Research. I passed this on to my dad as he likes "nutty" tasting spices.
customer_reviews.author: DaiaCharese

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Turmeric with all it's benefits is not easy to like the taste of....until now. I'm very pleased with Tur Latte. Clearly a quality product that tastes good. I enjoy it in my coffee every morning. I take it for it's anti-inflammatory benefits especially since I can not take ibuprofen. I do believe it helps as my soreness seems to diminish throughout the day. I will continue to purchase this brand.
customer_reviews.author: tmwaters

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this powder. I mix it with whey protein, water or almond milk in the morning and I feel like I have extra energy and feel better. Have been using it for a week and make a drink every morning with it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible.
customer_reviews.text: May just be me but I tried adding, raw sugar, honey, and raw maple syrup. Just can’t get into the flavor. Not an enjoyable flavor for me at all. Can’t return it so lost some more money. You guyz should offer samples. My bad.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Clark

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Tur-Latte. It arrived on time well packaged. It has a really nice flavor. I've used this on its own, in my coffee and cocoa. It mixes better in warm or hot liquids. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Cheap turmeric mix.
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting. Doesn’t taste like turmeric at all. Not spicy like other golden latte mixes. I’ve been using The brand Golde but it’s a bit more expensive and wanted to try something cheaper. Yeah I’m going back to Golde. Seriously, y’all should try it. This stuff tastes like detergent and nothing like a golden latte. Avoid!!
customer_reviews.author: TamTam

customer_reviews.title: Good, but
customer_reviews.text: This is good, but I prefer my own mixture and will go back to making my own,
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my boyfriend who had an injury (turmeric helps inflammation and healing). I must say that the injury that had been lingering 6 months improved dramatically after using this product at twice the dosage. I cant speak for taste since I never tried it
customer_reviews.author: Rashele Felina

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the Tumeric flavor is something a lot of people actually enjoy but I'm not a fan. Not being a fan of Indian cuisine I should have been weary but friends and family rave about it. I will give the remainder to one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Greg D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Dissolves well and tastes great. Had to literally dig through to bottom for the little scoop, bit it’s fine. Have taken it enough to make a statement about pain relief. Will probably reorder
customer_reviews.author: Kim Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Top taste!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other golden milk powders and this one is by far the nicest taste and doesnt have that gross artificial sweetener taste like the others. The box actually contains its own scoop, I find that half a scoop tastes best with slightly sweetened almond milk. The powder does seem to ‘drop’ down to the bottom of the cup like mud after a while so keep stirring before you take a sip.
customer_reviews.author: Mr L.

customer_reviews.title: The Bomb Matcha Tumeric Latte!
customer_reviews.text: Super yummy!!! Thank you so much! I made a green tea latte withhested almond milk, coconut oil, honey, and matcha green tea. Blended in Vita Mix When it was all blended I poured in cup then added the Tur-Latte and oh my gosh! So amazingly delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great evening wrap-up drink!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Not really sure if it works for pain but my daughter (21) and I love to have a cup at night while relax and talk over our day together. We like it hot in coconut milk with honey. Hits the spot and we sleep really well. Haven’t tried it cold yet but that’s next.....
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barker

customer_reviews.title: Love this golden milk infusion
customer_reviews.text: I very much enjoy this Tumeric Latte. The fact that its unsweetened is actually a good thing. I was drinking it with almond milk but I was told that its better if you ate or drank your Tumeric with a fat. I switched to whole milk for the fat and I actually LOVE it with the milk, much creamier and I'm not a milk fan!
customer_reviews.author: Gdunlap

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the Golden Lattes I get at coffee shops!
customer_reviews.text: I love Golden Lattes, but they aren't readily available where I live. I decided to try this mix and sure enough, it's just as good as what I get when I'm near a place that makes the lattes. Love this!!! Pro tip: use a milk frother to mix it up well so there are no chunks before you start heating up the mixture.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fugo

customer_reviews.text: Flavor wise is what you’ll expect, is earthy not too strong, derived from all the natural ingredients. Perhaps tumeric flavor dominates. My main problem is the solubility, using the amount of product and water recommended (hot) a good amount product sits at the bottom even after stirring. As the “medical claims” those obviously unverified. For the flavor I added half a spoon of raw honey and extra cinnamons to whats in the product and makes it better.
customer_reviews.author: Martian

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend it with hot dairy or almond milk
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend it with hot dairy or almond milk. It has a balanced taste thanks to the strong tumeric and ginger being balanced out by the coconut and cinnamon (though I am someone who loves tumeric and spices). I found the taste too irresistible and finished my first cup in ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Romney

customer_reviews.title: Very Soapy Golden Milk
customer_reviews.text: Out of all of the golden milks I have tried, this by far is the worst tasting one. It feels like I am drinking a soapy mug. On top of that, my joints hurt more since making the switch. Lose, lose if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: AAV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Health product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasant taste. I tried it with my Ensure and crushed ice. The Black pepper flavor is superb. Will definately keep on purchasing and recommending it to my family and friends. It has helped my digestion tremendously as well. GO FOR IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jan G

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: Extremely delicious fall taste mixed with heated cashew milk. Feels very comforting before bed drink. Hoping it will help over time with inflammation. I also researched all the ingredients and found this to be a safe choice for dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Doyle

customer_reviews.title: My coffee replacement
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking this every morning as a coffee replacement. 1 scoop with 8 oz. almond milk. I was worried of the taste being chalky but there was only a slight chalky taste. Aside from that, I really enjoy this and will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfection!
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly delicious. I got turned on to golden milk through a local cafe and this mix tastes exactly the same. I put it in soy milk and use a frother. It's heavenly tasting and so soothing at night.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara F.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because it is organic and has natural ingredients. It has a smooth taste, not very spicy. It has an almost creamy flavor because of the coconut milk powder. I do add a little coconut oil and maple syrup to make a taste a little more complex. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Golden Milk !
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mixed in coffee. The smell and flavor is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Hamza

customer_reviews.title: Super addition to my mornings
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking to add turmeric to my dietary intake in ways that are beyond just flavoring food or taking a capsule. I love making my morning latte with this! A few variations include adding it to a chai tea or adding it to a ginger tea. Love the ease and it makes it easy to take with me when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: The Best I've Tasted!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious! I mix it in with a cup of milk, a little bit of jaggery (a traditional cane sugar), and viola! The best cup of hot golden milk EVER! I will definitely be sharing this with family and friends and purchasing more. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella6691

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good.
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect this tea to taste so good. I make it with milk in the microwave. It’s too slow to heat over the stove and that may taste better though. It’s a very nice and relaxing tea at about 4:00 in the afternoon. I’ll order again when it’s empty.
customer_reviews.author: Fishj

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It is much better tasting than I anticipated. I just add a little sugar and it tastes really good in hot milk. Also, very soothing for the throat. I am happy and satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this. I drink this instead of tea in the evening and even put a spoonful in my hot cocoa.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna's Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: Taste great! Definitely will continue to use. As for pain relief I haven’t been taking long enough ... will definitely keep it going for 30-60 days and see if I get pain relief
customer_reviews.author: Aw

customer_reviews.title: Tastes nice but doesn't really help
customer_reviews.text: It taste good. Doesn't have a pungent taste like grating a fresh turmeric and also doesn't stain. I haven't notice much benefits as to when I used a fresh turmeric.
customer_reviews.author: annafina

product_meta.title: TUR LATTE - USDA ORGANIC CERTIFIED GOLDEN MILK POWDER WITH CEYLON CINNAMON - Turmeric Latte Mix - Superfoods - Anti-Inflammatory, Non-GMO, Vegan, Keto, Gluten-free, Unsweetened (45 servings)
feature_bullets: FLAVORFUL GOLDEN MILK POWDER: TUR LATTE is a rich and delicious tumeric latte mix that gives your body the extra boost it needs to fight inflammation and help you feel better. We also took YOUR feedback and ADDED CEYLON CINNAMON while retaining the aroma and taste of the original golden powder.

USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC TURMERIC LATTE MIX: USDA certification means TUR LATTE has been lab-tested by the certifying authority to be free of lead, heavy metals, and pesticides. If you are using other brands that do not have USDA organic certification (look for the "OFFICIAL USDA ORGANIC SEAL") you may be at risk of consuming turmeric that has not been tested and could have higher amounts of lead or other heavy metals.

KETO FRIENDLY WITH NO SUGARS NO STEVIA NO SWEETENERS: You decide which sweetener to add and how much, or just enjoy it unsweetened. Sweeteners of choice; honey, coconut sugar, brown sugar, date sugar, maple syrup, jaggery, stevia, or others. MULTIPLE USES: Use TUR LATTE golden milk super blend to make a golden latte, turmeric paste, turmeric drink, turmeric tonic, turmeric tea, turmeric chai, tumeric milk.

ENHANCED BIO-AVAILABILITY AND HEALING INGREDIENTS: Formulated with black pepper, TUR LATTE organic golden milk mix increases the rate of your body's ability to absorb and benefit from the anti-inflammatory benefits of turmeric. In addition, our turmeric golden milk mix is formulated with Gotu kola to slow aging, Ashwagandha to regulate the immune system, and the warm aromatic spices Fennel, Cinnamon, Ginger, and Natural Vanilla to give the blend an incredible aroma and a warm soothing flavor.

RAW AND ROOT PROMISE: We want you to be fully satisfied and love your organic golden milk made with TUR LATTE! If you are not satisfied with our product, receive a full refund. We've made this easy for you so you don't have to even return the used product. Just contact us directly through your order to request a refund.
